title: Step Configuration
description: All steps should have a defined configuration, this is how you define the step's behavior and how it will be triggered.

title: API Endpoint Configuration
description: DELETE endpoint at /js/pets/:id for soft-deleting a pet.

title: Soft Delete Operation
description: Performs a soft delete by marking the pet for deletion.

title: Success Response
description: Returns confirmation of deletion or 404 if pet not found.
